nodes.text: Shili cheese dogs were a type of food served at the eatery known as Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant due to the fact that they were considered delicious by the eatery's owner, the Besalisk Dexter Jettster. The dish cost 5.5 credits and was served with a cup of soup as one of the lunch and dinner Pantoran Plate Specials available on Taungsday. The establishment's chef and owner, the Besalisk Dexter Jettster, made the dogs in the style of the Togruta species of the planet Shili. The dish was served at Dex's at some point prior to the eatery's destruction during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's rule.

Shili cheese dogs were first mentioned in the 2009 StarWars.com Hyperspace exclusive article, "Dining at Dex's," which was written as an in-universe menu for Dex's Diner by Gregory Walker. Their name was a pun on real world chili cheese dogs.
